original: Ådahl, Klas Arvid, kyrkoherde, Backa, Göteborg, f. 14/10/80 i Kinna, Älvsb. ’1., av Andreas Karlsson o. Charlotta Andersson. G. 1. 07 m,. Anna Elisabet Svensson, d. 40; 2. 45 m. Gunhild Wetterqvist. Barn: Gunnar f. 10, kyrkoh., Länghem, Yngve 12, kyrko-adj. i Vasa förs., Gbg, Henrik 15, bank-tj :m., Gbg, Bertil 22, jur. stud., Lund, Sune 23’, kont., Gbg. — Mog:ex. i Skara 02, teol. fil. ex. i04, teor. teol ex. 05, prästv. f. Gbgs stift 06. Pastorsadj. i Torestorp 06, lär. v. Frölichska skolan i Istorp 07, kommin. i Öxabäck s. å., i Halmstad 16, las :pred. där 18-28, kyrkoh,. i Backa sed. 28, pred. v. S :t Jörgens sjukh. sed. 29. Ordf. i kyrkostämma, led. av kyrkofullm., v. ordf. i styr. f. Gbgs prästgymn. Ådab!, Arvid Gunnar Johannes, kyrkoherde, Länghem, f. 18/5/10 i Öxabäck, Älvsb. 1., av kyrkoh. Arvid Å. o. Anna Svensson. G. 38 m. Disa Ohlander. Barn: Ingela f. 39, Staffan 41. — Stud:ex. i Halmstad 28, teol. fil. ex. i Gbg 29, teol. kand. i Lund 34, prakt. teol. prov o. prästv. i Gbg s. å. Pastorsadj. i Backa 34, i Gbg 3’6, kommin. i Månstad 39, kyrkoh. i Länghem sed. 47. I Månstad ordf. i kyrkostämma, skolråd o. barnav:nd. _ Åfeldt, Per Axel Oscar, jur. kand., tingsnotarie, tf. stadsfiskal, Växjö, f. 7/10/13 i Gbg av apot. Olof Å. o. Frieda Bergström. G. 43 m. Gunvor Israelson. Barn: Eva f. 44. — Stud:ex. v. Malmö h. a. 1. 33, jur. kand. i Lund 43’. Anst. i marinförv. 43-44, tingstjg. i Södertörns doms. 44, v. poliskamm. i Sthlm 44 v. rådhusr. i Malmö 44’-45, v. Östra Värends doms. fr. 45. Tf. stadsfiskal i Växjö periodvis 46.
translated: Ådahl, Klas Arvid, vicar, Backa, Gothenburg, b. 14/10/80 in Kinna, Älvsborg county, son of Andreas Karlsson and Charlotta Andersson. M. 1. 07 m, Anna Elisabet Svensson, d. 40; 2. 45 m. Gunhild Wetterqvist. Children: Gunnar b. 10, vicar, Länghem, Yngve b. 12, church-adjutant in Vasa parish, Gothenburg, Henrik b. 15, bank employee, Gothenburg, Bertil b. 22, law student, Lund, Sune b. 23', clerk, Gothenburg. — Graduated from Skara with a degree of theology in 02, obtained degree in theological philosophy in 04, theoretical theology degree in 05, ordained priest in the Gothenburg diocese in 06. Pastor's assistant in Torestorp in 06, teacher at Frölichska school in Istorp in 07, curate in Öxabäck the same year, in Halmstad in 16, chaplain there from 18-28, vicar in Backa since 28, preacher at St. Jörgen Hospital since 29. Chairman of church assembly, member of church council, vice chairman of the board for Gothenburg priest seminary. Ådahl, Arvid Gunnar Johannes, vicar, Länghem, b. 18/5/10 in Öxabäck, Älvsborg county, son of vicar Arvid Å. and Anna Svensson. M. 38 m. Disa Ohlander. Children: Ingela b. 39, Staffan 41. — Graduated from Halmstad in 28, obtained a degree of theological philosophy in Gothenburg in 29, theological cand. in Lund in 34, practical theology examination and ordained priest in Gothenburg the same year. Pastor's assistant in Backa in 34, in Gothenburg in 3'6, curate in Månstad in 39, vicar in Länghem since 47. Chairman of church assembly, school board, and child welfare committee in Månstad. Åfeldt, Per Axel Oscar, law graduate, court official, acting city prosecutor, Växjö, b. 7/10/13 in Gothenburg, son of pharmacist Olof Å. and Frieda Bergström. M. 43 m. Gunvor Israelson. Child: Eva b. 44. — Graduated from Malmö higher secondary school in 33, law graduate in Lund in 43'. Employed in the navy administration from 43-44, court clerk in Södertörn district court in 44, deputy police commissioner in Stockholm in 44, deputy magistrate in Malmö city court in 44'-45, in Östra Värends district court from 45. Acting city prosecutor in Växjö periodically from 46.
